snippet: The two faced off against a man and a woman on a crowded street on Friday morning, the police said; the cause is under investigation.
abstract: Video captured outside McDonald's restaurant in Harlem shows knife fight in which one man is killed and woman fatally stabbed; police have not identified the four people shown in video.
lead_paragraph: The two faced off against a man and a woman on a crowded street on Friday morning, the police said; the cause is under investigation.

headline.main: Man Killed and Woman Badly Hurt in Knife Fight on Harlem Sidewalk
headline.print_headline: Man Killed and Woman Badly Hurt in Knife Fight on Harlem Sidewalk
